summary: Full QA pass of My Dammaiguda civic engagement platform - Iteration 43. Backend 100% passing (23/23 tests). Frontend flows validated with identified issues: Benefits and Education pages redirect to login incorrectly, Manager portal password not set.

integration_issues.issue: /benefits page redirects to login modal even for public access - should be accessible without login
/education page redirects to login modal even for public access - should be accessible without login
Manager phone 7386917770 shows 'Password not set. Contact administrator' - cannot login to Staff Portal
/admin/panel redirects to user OTP login instead of Staff Portal - should redirect to /portals

action_items: Fix Benefits page (/benefits) to be accessible without login - currently shows login modal
Fix Education page (/education) to be accessible without login - currently shows login modal
Set password for manager account 7386917770 in Staff Portal or add OTP-based login for managers
critical_code_review_comments: Protected route logic needs review - /benefits and /education should be public routes
Staff Portal only supports password login, not OTP - consider adding OTP option for managers
Course Manager UI working correctly with CRUD operations

success_rate.frontend: 85% - Core flows work, Benefits/Education access blocked

manager_otp_login.status: Password not set for Staff Portal

context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend APIs all working. OTP login flow works (tested with 9999999999+123456). Staff Portal password login works (9100063133+Plan@123). Admin Panel->Course Manager->Full Stack course has 4 subjects with HTML&CSS having 4 lessons, others have 0 lessons. Issues page works without auth. News page works with categories. Key issues: /benefits and /education pages redirect to login - need to be made public routes.

user_pages.dashboard: PASS - AQI widget, Citizen Wall visible
